text: Lewinella cohaerens is a bacterium from the genus of Lewinella which has been isolated from mid-littoral mud in Biarritz in France. == References == == Further reading == * * ==External links== *Type strain of Lewinella cohaerens at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingobacteriia Category:Bacteria described in 1970
title: Lewinella cohaerens
